mapper.select: select count(*) as count from coupon_master
select count(*) as count from coupon_master where ${keyField} = #{keyword}

select coupon_master_seq couponMasterSeq, coupon_name couponName, open_date_start openDateStart, open_date_end openDateEnd, ep_date epDate, option_header optionHeader, option_detail optionDetail, img_name imgName, dc_option dcOption, dc dc, coupon_count couponCount from coupon_master

select * from( select @NO := @NO + 1 as ROWNUM, A.* from ( select cm.coupon_master_seq couponMasterSeq, cm.coupon_name couponName, cm.open_date_start openDateStart, cm.open_date_end openDateEnd, cm.ep_date epDate, cm.option_header optionHeader, cm.option_detail optionDetail, cm.img_name imgName, cm.dc_option dcOption, cm.dc dc, cm.coupon_count couponCount from coupon_master cm where ${keyField} = #{keyword} order by coupon_master_seq desc )A, (select @NO := 0)B )C where C.ROWNUM BETWEEN #{start} and #{end};
mapper.update: update coupon_master set coupon_count = coupon_count - 1 where coupon_master_seq = ${couponMasterSeq}
mapper.select: select t2.* from (select @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS seq ,cm.coupon_master_seq couponMasterSeq ,cm.coupon_name couponName ,CONCAT(date_format(cm.open_date_start,'%Y-%m-%d %H'),'시') openDateStart ,CONCAT(date_format(date_add(cm.open_date_end,interval 1 second),'%Y-%m-%d %H'),'시') openDateEnd ,CONCAT(date_format(date_add(cm.ep_date,interval 1 second),'%Y-%m-%d %H'),'시') epDate ,cm.option_header optionHeader ,cm.option_detail optionDetail ,cm.img_name imgName ,cm.dc_option dcOption ,cm.dc ,cm.coupon_count couponCount from coupon_master cm ,(SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) R ) t2 where t2.seq between #{start} and #{end} order by t2.couponMasterSeq asc;

select cm.coupon_master_seq couponMasterSeq ,cm.coupon_name couponName ,CONCAT(date_format(cm.open_date_start,'%Y-%m-%d %H'),'시') openDateStart ,CONCAT(date_format(date_add(cm.open_date_end,interval 1 second),'%Y-%m-%d %H'),'시') openDateEnd ,CONCAT(date_format(date_add(cm.ep_date,interval 1 second),'%Y-%m-%d %H'),'시') epDate ,cm.option_header optionHeader ,cm.option_detail optionDetail ,cm.img_name imgName ,cm.dc_option dcOption ,cm.dc ,cm.coupon_count couponCount FROM coupon_master cm where cm.coupon_master_seq = #{keyword}
mapper.insert: { call insert_coupon_master( #{couponName, mode=IN,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{openDateStart, mode=IN,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{openDateEnd, mode=IN,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{epDate, mode=IN,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{optionHeader, mode=IN,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{optionDetail, mode=IN,jdbcType=CLOB}, #{imgName, mode=IN,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dcOption, mode=IN,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dc, mode=IN,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{couponCount, mode=IN,jdbcType=INTEGER} ) }
